## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `cd backend && ruff check . && black --check .` with no errors
- [ ] I have run `cd frontend && npm run lint` with no errors
- [ ] Self-reviewed my own code for obvious issues

### Backend Changes (if applicable)
- [ ] Database migrations created and tested (`alembic revision`)
- [ ] API endpoint documentation updated
- [ ] Service layer tests added
- [ ] Error handling is appropriate

### Frontend Changes (if applicable)
- [ ] TypeScript types are correct (no `any` types)
- [ ] Storybook stories created for new components
- [ ] Responsive design tested
- [ ] Loading/error states handled

### Documentation
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated under [Unreleased]
- [ ] README updated if needed
- [ ] Code comments added where necessary
